Here is a list of all struct and union fields with links to the structures/unions they belong to:

- o -

  • offset : NV_EDID_V3
  • offsetTexChannels : NV_SCANOUT_INTENSITY_DATA_V2
  • offsetTexture : NV_SCANOUT_INTENSITY_DATA_V2
  • opcode : NvShaderExtnStruct
  • outConfig : _NVVIOCONFIG_V1 , _NVVIOCONFIG_V2 , _NVVIOCONFIG_V3
  • outputArea : _NVVIOOUTPUTCONFIG_V1 , _NVVIOOUTPUTCONFIG_V2 , _NVVIOOUTPUTCONFIG_V3
  • outputId : NVVIOTOPOLOGYTARGET
  • outputRegion : _NVVIOOUTPUTCONFIG_V1 , _NVVIOOUTPUTCONFIG_V2 , _NVVIOOUTPUTCONFIG_V3
  • outputVideoLocked : _NVVIOOUTPUTSTATUS
  • outStatus : _NVVIOSTATUS
  • ov : _NV_GPU_PERF_PSTATES20_INFO_V2
  • overlapX : NV_MOSAIC_TOPOLOGY , _NV_MOSAIC_GRID_TOPO_DISPLAY_V2 , NV_MOSAIC_TOPO_DETAILS , _NV_MOSAIC_GRID_TOPO_DISPLAY_V1
  • overlapY : _NV_MOSAIC_GRID_TOPO_DISPLAY_V1 , NV_MOSAIC_TOPO_DETAILS , NV_MOSAIC_TOPOLOGY , _NV_MOSAIC_GRID_TOPO_DISPLAY_V2

  • ownerType : _NVVIOCAPS
